pages.title: Kamen Rider Odin
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Ryuki (2002, TV show)$(br)Health: 40Special moves:$(li)Uses Advent Cards to gain weapons$(br2)Drops$(li)1 $(l:ryuki/items/contract_advent_cards#goldphoenix_advent)Goldphoenix Advent Card$(/l)$(li)1-2 $(l:ryuki/arsenal/sword_vent_cards#gold_saber_vent)Goldsaber Sword Vent Cards$(/l),$(l:ryuki/arsenal/guard_vent_cards#gold_shield_vent)Goldshield Guard Vent Cards$(/l), or $(l:ryuki/arsenal/time_vent)Time Vent Cards$(/l)
